Package model

Class ImageOperations

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.ImageOperations
  • public class ImageOperations
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the logic for all the operations that should be performed on the images. Some of the supported operations are filters, transforms, splitting and combining RGB images.

    • Constructor Summary

      ImageOperations()

      This functions the individual red, green, and blue components into a single image.

      This function sharpens the image.

      • combineRGB

                                  Image greenImage,
                                  Image blueImage)
        This functions the individual red, green, and blue components into a single image.
        Parameters:
        redImage - image with the red component.
        greenImage - image with the green component.

        Returns:
        returns the combined image.
